reviewText: I am the Director of NEIH, and I want to make it clear that a training purchased from any individual or company other than NEIH will not include certification.  The only person who is eligible to certify with an NEIH training is the original enrolling student.

A UK resident moved to Canada enrolled with NEIH and found correspondance was excellent, My payment methods were complicated because of my move and NEIH sorted out my problems quickley as many payment options were offered. I've completed their CH201 training which I found excellently set out and very easy to follow and absorb and passed with very high marks. It covers,History of hypnosis for the novice,Interview procedures to maximise information gathered,Scripts,deepening,evaluating,PLR and so much more. I have now completed their CH202 before my move back to the UK and again passing with high marks. I am at present working on their CH203 master clinical cert, so make your own minds up but I was just a truck driver intrested in the mind and now through NEIH and back in the UK looking at starting up my own pratice thankyou NEIH for a brighter future.

The program was well done, very clear and easy to learn from. This is especially important as I am learning 5000 miles from the USA. I highly recommend it to any serious minded individual who wants to work in Hypnotherapy.

This is a quality training that does what the website says it does.  It takes someone with no training or experience and prepares them to hypnotize other people and to develop a hypnotherapy practice. One of the best features is that NEIH offers free student hotline support during the training and after the student begins to practice.  The video quality is good, and the format is seminar-style, so you feel like you're right there in the classroom.  Nice people to deal with.
